RE ALones Group Mirant Energy Americas LP Cc Denise I believe Will Frederking may be involved Original Message From Furey Denise Sent Wednesday August PM To Copeland James L Ring Richard Subject RE ALones Group Mirant Energy Americas LP Richard who is the attorney drafting this document I need to ask him a few questions before I can give him the credit language Original Message From Copeland James L Sent Wednesday August PM To Ring Richard Cc Furey Denise Subject RE ALones Group Mirant Energy Americas LP I spoke with Denise briefly and I believe she was looking into the EEI issue with Ed Sacks I would contact Denise directly on this one as I believe Dana has not been involved to date Original Message From Ring Richard Sent Wednesday August PM To Copeland James L Subject ALones Group Mirant Energy Americas LP James Thanks for your help with ALones Group and Mirant Energy Americas LP I have not heard anything from Denise Furey or Dana Smith regarding our conversation from Monday August th Do you have any additional information or should I contact Dana Smith Regards Richard
